about_the_game:
A pack of decoration items based on our previous game, Warnet Life. This pack is for those of you who wants to support the development of Bakso Simulator. Pack contains :
  • Majek Doll
  • Bakso Man Doll
  • Painter Clerk Doll
  • Napos Doll
  • Fian Doll
  • Sisar Doll
  • Lases Doll
  • Meon Doll
  • Hitap Doll
  • Sarah Doll
  • Shaman Doll
  • Security Doll

Once the DLC is purchased, the items can be claimed from your in-game tablet and then can be picked up from SiLambat pickup point. Note that each DLC can only be claimed once on each save file.

Thank you so much for your support!

* The items included are purely cosmetic decorations that provides no gameplay advantage

name: Bakso Simulator - Fan Pack #1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A pack of items for those of you who wants to support the development of Bakso Simulator
